entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:34 p.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets mixed with rain beginning in the evening then changing to freezing rain before morning. Ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
